Content: Every weapon/equimpment or ship component  should have a required crew
count and an optimal crew count describing what it needs to operate,
these counts are then used to carry over to the unit or starship. This
might be fractions so for example a gun needs 1 soldier and 0.01 staff
officers (100 soldiers one staff officer) a tank 3 drivers and 0.0625
staff officer (1 enginner per 20 tanks and one tactican for 80 tanks).
